dast_description: SQL injection vulnerability in mystats.php in MyStats 1.0.8 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the details parameter.

sast_description: Schannel in Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP2, Windows Vista SP2, Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, and Windows RT Gold and 8.
